column4: Does apt/synaptic/adept/dpkg keep track of from where a package was installed?
I've installed 3rd-party packages in the past, and I want to find out if they've persisted across upgrades
3rd party packages persist (alteast most of them)

I know they default to persisting- I've got opera going from my feisty install here on my gutsy beta.  What I'm trying to find out is if packages that weren't in the repositories in the past have been replaced by ones that are there now
